name: adjacency-matrix
description: Create and maintain edges in an adjacency matrix
author: kapow

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: Numeric value to assign/increment/decrement to edge (from, to).

parameters.name: nodeNames
parameters.description: Names of nodes in graph, which correspond to edge endpoints. Each must be unique in the array.

parameters.name: undirected
parameters.description: Boolean for if graph is an undirected graph.

parameters.name: initializedMatrix
parameters.description: Matrix to initialize to. Must have number rows = number columns = size of nodeNames with all numeric enteries.
